user_query: cybersecurity and ethical hacking courses focusing on network security, penetration testing, and information security management. prefer courses with hands-on labs any course but not from Coursera

udacity.Title: Ethical Hacker
udacity.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for cybersecurity professionals by gaining the offensive security skills to protect an organization’s computer networks and systems.
udacity.Prequisites: Linux, Networking, Programming and Windows OS.
udacity.What you learn: You’ll master the skills necessary to become a successful Ethical Hacker. Learn how to find and exploit vulnerabilities and weaknesses in various systems, design and execute a penetration testing plan, and report on test findings using valid evidence.

simplilearn.Title: Professional Certificate Program in Ethical Hacking and Penetration Testing
simplilearn.Short Intro: Boost your career as a cybersecurity expert through this PCP in Ethical Hacking and Penetration Testing in collaboration with IIT Kanpur. In 6 months, you'll learn advanced offensive cybersecurity strategies to protect networks and data from breaches, theft, attacks, and more

simplilearn.Title: CEH v12 - Certified Ethical Hacking Course
simplilearn.Short Intro: Learn advanced processes in this (CEH) Certified Ethical Hacking course. In this online ethical hacking certification training, you will master advanced network packet analysis and system penetration testing techniques to build your network security skill-set and prevent hackers. You will get access to certified expert professionals who will guide you throughout your learning journey._x000D_
simplilearn.Course Type: Ranked #1 Best Cybersecurity Bootcamp by Career Karma

futurelearn.Title: Microsoft Future Ready: Developing Applications Using Javascript
futurelearn.Short Intro: Gain hands-on web development experience as you learn the skills for using JavaScript and complete practical exercises.
